name: FDMNES powered by sparse solvers
short_description:
It is non official fork of FDMNES project (http://neel.cnrs.fr/spip.php?rubrique1007&lang=en), which can use different solvers:
    simple but slow solver,
    MUMPS parallel solver,
    UMFPACK sequential solver.

To use MUMPS current package of fdmnes is parallized twice: by energy and inside MUMPS solver. MUMPS can solve system of equations in parallel. To use this feature, environment variable HOST_NUM_FOR_MUMPS was introduced.

All MPI-hosts are divided into groups of size HOST_NUM_FOR_MUMPS each. Hosts of one group perform parallel calculation for common energy value on common system of linear equations. Default value of HOST_NUM_FOR_MUMPS is 1. This scheme makes possible calculaton of huge problems.
summary: Non official fork of FDMNES project
